body: I love this series. I dont really into tsundere but this one is too damn cute

Please enjoy, I want others to have as good of an experience with this series as I had. ||||| All chapters (1-17): https://hentai2read.com/traditional_job_of_washing_girls_body/ ||||| Reol - Summer Horror Party (loop edit): https://a.tumblr.com/tumblr_ppvti2uKQZ1ruvo7so1.mp3 ||||| Hentai adaptation episode 1: https://www.pornhub.com/view_video.php?viewkey=ph5cacbf881ba0b ||||| Hentai adaptation episode 2: https://www.pornhub.com/view_video.php?viewkey=ph5cacbef75c13d

God, what an angelic tsundere waifu. I just spent about 3 hours taking my time to read all the chapters thus far (with chill Reol music in the background) while just barely holding back until after I'd seen all of this series and man, that was so worth the climax.

Now by "all of this series" I mean chapters 1-6 also (which are not here for some reason), plus the two animated hentai shorts they've made so far. I'd recommend reading chapters 1-6 before watching the hentai shorts though, cause the hentais are basically adaptations of those chapters but with the story severely altered and watered down, way more than what you'd ever see with a manga-to-anime adaptation.

Also there's no subs in the videos I found, but that shouldn't be much of a problem for anyone who reads the corresponding chapters first.
The source material is way better fap material anyway if you ask me, but the hentai shorts are still a nice bonus to complement the series.
By the way you are welcome that I mentioned this is getting animated I noticed it on livechart.me a week or so ago and got real excited for it

Seems like there's going to be an animation 

https://muchohentai.com/133804/VDpEZc/2019/02/24/pv-araiya-san-ore-to-aitsu-ga-onnayu-de-episode-1-first-preview/
Wait, there's gonna be an animated version of this??
Anyone else looking forward to the fully animated version in april
Fucking cliffhangers... My dick and my heart can not take it...
I fapped so hard to this 10/10 comic
